name: 2d TileMap/Poplation Sim Generator Unity
description:
Right Click to start a new simulation.

This is a Map Generator that creates tile maps based upon the way in which mold reproduces. It is more of a tool that can be used in conjunction with Unity. Each cell it creates is a individual tile, with it's own sprite. You can then segment the tile into smaller grids and run the algorithm again..etc.
Population (represented by the brown squares) are built upon the same formula with  few variations to look for more dense groups to have more babies at. It can be used for other things as well, such as resource nodes, added lakes, whatever your little heart desires.

What am I going to do with it? Well I have plans. Follow to get the latest.
